mapper.select: select bds_id, h.aptCode, aptName,concat(sidoName, ' ', gugunName, ' ', h.dongName, ' ', h.jibun) as address, area, floor, price, type, owner_id, h.dongCode from Budongsan b join houseinfo h on b.aptCode = h.aptCode join baseaddress b2 on h.dongCode = b2.dongCode where owner_id = #{userSeq};

select market_id, m.bds_id, B.aptCode, aptName,concat(sidoName, ' ', gugunName, ' ', h.dongName) as address, area, floor, price, type, owner_id, h.dongCode from market m join Budongsan B on m.bds_id = B.bds_id join houseinfo h on B.aptCode = h.aptCode join baseaddress b2 on h.dongCode = b2.dongCode where h.dongCode = #{dongCode}

select market_id, m.bds_id, B.aptCode, aptName,concat(sidoName, ' ', gugunName, ' ', h.dongName, ' ', h.jibun) as address, area, floor, price, type, owner_id, h.dongCode from market m join Budongsan B on m.bds_id = B.bds_id join houseinfo h on B.aptCode = h.aptCode join baseaddress b2 on h.dongCode = b2.dongCode where h.aptCode = #{aptCode}
mapper.insert: insert into housedeal (bds_id, dealAmount, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, rentMoney, buyer_id, seller_id) values (#{bdsId},#{dealAmount},#{dealYear},#{dealMonth},#{dealDay},#{rentMoney},#{buyerId},#{sellerId})
